responses: Hi there, what can I do for you?
Hi there, how can I help?

Bye! Come back again soon later.

patterns: Where is the nearest restaurants to me?
How do I find a restaurant in this neighbourhood?
responses: You can search nearby restaurants by typing restaurants in the search box
You can refer to this page to find recommended restaurants: https://www.tripadvisor.ca/Restaurants

patterns: I want to contact the developer of this page.
Where can I contact the dev of the page?

responses: You can email me at k4tieu@uwaterloo.ca.

patterns: Can I see the source code of the site?

responses: Why did the hipster burn his mouth? He drank the coffee before it was cool.
What did the buffalo say when his son left for college? Bison.
